item.text: Now the famine was severe in the land.
When they finished eating the grain they had brought from Egypt, their father said to them, “Return, buy us a little more food.”
But Judah said to him, “The man solemnly warned us, ‘You will not see my face unless your brother is with you.’

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="03426 07971">send</st><n id="1" /> our <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> us, we’ll <st data-num="03381" class="">go down</st> and <st data-num="07666" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st> for you.
But if you will not send him, we won’t go down there because the man said to us, ‘You will not see my face unless your brother is with you.’”
Israel said, “Why did you bring this trouble on me by telling the man you had one more brother?”

They replied, “The man questioned us thoroughly about ourselves and our family, saying, ‘Is your father still alive? Do you have another brother?’ So we answered him in this way. How could we possibly know that he would say, ‘Bring your brother down’?”
Then Judah said to his father Israel, “Send the boy with me and we will go immediately. Then we will live and not die—we and you and our little ones.

I <st data-num="0595">myself</st> <st data-num="06148" class="">pledge security</st><n id="1" /> for him; you may <st data-num="01245" class="">hold</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">me</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">liable</st>. <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> I do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> him back <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you and <st data-num="03322" class="">place</st> him here <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you, I will <st data-num="02398" class="">bear the blame</st> before you <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> my <st data-num="03117" class="">life</st>.<n id="2" />
But if we had not delayed, we could have traveled there and back twice by now!”

Then their father Israel said to them, “If it must be so, then do this: Take some of the best products of the land in your bags, and take a gift down to the man—a little balm and a little honey, spices and myrrh, pistachios and almonds.

<st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st> <st data-num="04932" class="">double</st> the <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> with <st data-num="03027" class="">you</st>;<n id="1" /> you must <st data-num="07725 03027">take back</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> that was <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> in the <st data-num="06310" class="">mouths</st> of your <st data-num="0572" class="">sacks</st>—<st data-num="0194" class="">perhaps</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> was an <st data-num="04870" class="">oversight</st>.

<st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> too, and <st data-num="07725" class="">go</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">right away</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>.<n id="2" />
May the Sovereign God grant you mercy before the man so that he may release your other brother and Benjamin! As for me, if I lose my children I lose them.”
So the men took these gifts, and they took double the money with them, along with Benjamin. Then they hurried down to Egypt and stood before Joseph.

When <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them, he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the servant <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Bring</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="02873" class="">Slaughter</st> an <st data-num="02874" class="">animal</st> and <st data-num="03559" class="">prepare</st> it, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me at <st data-num="06672" class="">noon</st>.”
The man did just as Joseph said; he brought the men into Joseph’s house.

But the men were afraid when they were brought to Joseph’s house. They said, “We are being brought in because of the money that was returned in our sacks last time. He wants to capture us, make us slaves, and take our donkeys!”

So they <st data-num="05066 0413">approached</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="05921" class="">in charge of</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="0994 0113">lord</st>, we did <st data-num="03381" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">come down</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08462" class="">first time</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="07666" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st>.

But <st data-num="01961 03588">when</st> we <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04411" class="">place where</st> we <st data-num="04411" class="">spent the night</st>, we <st data-num="06605" class="">opened</st> our <st data-num="0572" class="">sacks</st> and <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> of us <st data-num="02009" class="">found</st> his <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st>—the <st data-num="04948" class="">full</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">amount</st><n id="1" />—in the <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> of his <st data-num="0572" class="">sack</st>. So we have <st data-num="07725 03027">returned</st> it.<n id="2" />
We have brought additional money with us to buy food. We do not know who put the money in our sacks!”

“Everything is fine,” the man in charge of Joseph’s household told them. “Don’t be afraid. Your God and the God of your father has given you treasure in your sacks. I had your money.” Then he brought Simeon out to them.
The servant in charge brought the men into Joseph’s house. He gave them water, and they washed their feet. Then he gave food to their donkeys.
They got their gifts ready for Joseph’s arrival at noon, for they had heard that they were to have a meal there.
When Joseph came home, they presented him with the gifts they had brought inside, and they bowed down to the ground before him.

He <st data-num="07592" class="">asked</st> them <st data-num="07965" class="">how</st> they were <st data-num="07965" class="">doing</st>.<n id="1" /> Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Is your <st data-num="02205" class="">aging</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="07965" class="">well</st>, the <st data-num="0834" class="">one</st> you <st data-num="0559" class="">spoke about</st>? Is he <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">alive</st>?”
“Your servant our father is well,” they replied. “He is still alive.” They bowed down in humility.
When Joseph looked up and saw his brother Benjamin, his mother’s son, he said, “Is this your youngest brother, whom you told me about?” Then he said, “May God be gracious to you, my son.”
Joseph hurried out, for he was overcome by affection for his brother and was at the point of tears. So he went to his room and wept there.
Then he washed his face and came out. With composure he said, “Set out the food.”

They <st data-num="07760" class="">set</st> a <st data-num="0905" class="">place</st> for him, a <st data-num="0905" class="">separate place</st> for his brothers,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0905" class="">another</st> for the <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptians</st> who were <st data-num="0398" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him. (The <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptians</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">are</st> <st data-num="03588 03808">not</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="0398 03899">eat</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="05680" class="">Hebrews</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptians</st> think it <st data-num="01931" class="">is</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">disgusting</st><n id="2" /> to do so.)<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="03427" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> him, arranged by order of birth, <st data-num="01062" class="">beginning</st> with the <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st> and <st data-num="06812" class="">ending</st> with the <st data-num="06810" class="">youngest</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="08539" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">other</st> <st data-num="08539" class="">in astonishment</st>.<n id="2" />
He gave them portions of the food set before him, but the portion for Benjamin was five times greater than the portions for any of the others. They drank with Joseph until they all became drunk.
